paragraph.taxonomicName: Neoeutypella M. Raza, Q.J. Shang, Phookamsak & L. Cai, Fungal Diversity 95: 167 (2019)

subSubSection.paragraph:
The genus
Neoeutypella
was introduced by Phookamsak et al. (2019) and is characterised by carbonaceous stromata immersed or semi-immersed on the host, 8-spored asci and hyaline or pale reddish-brown to brown ascospores. In this study, we introduce a new collection of
N. baoshanensis
, isolated from Guizhou Province in China.
